text:
Cleopatra
I temi egiziani sono un must have per i fornitori di slot machine e IGT non fa eccezione.   Che cosa ha di speciale Cleopatra, la slot gratis e senza registrazione oltre ad una  ambientazione nell’Antico Egitto? Scopriamolo insieme in questa recensione che ti farà scoprire nuovi trucchi per vincere le migliori combinazioni vincenti.

Cleopatra: la regina dell’Egitto
Cleopatra è una slot tradizionale sviluppata dal colosso di iGaming IGT. Si tratta di una delle slot più popolari di tutti i tempi a tema egiziano. Possiede 5 rulli e 20 linee di pagamento, oltre un RTP che supera il 92%. Può essere giocata puntando da 0,10€ fino ad un massimo di 10,00€ a giro sia su dispositivi desktop che su tablet e dispositivi mobili. Rilasciata alcuni anni fa, la grafica e le animazioni ti sembreranno un po’ datate ma in realtà aggiungono quel tocco di vintage al gioco.

I principali simboli vincenti
Non appena comincia la partita ti ritroverai sullo sfondo dello schermo un antico tempio egizio e i rulli tempestati da preziose icone in stile egiziano oltre ai simboli classici:

Cleopatra è il simbolo Jolly e sostituisce tutte le icone ad esclusione della Sfinge,
Lo Scarabeo è il simbolo più gratificante e fortunato di questa slot online. Se ne appaiono 5 su una linea di pagamento ti faranno vincere 37,5 volte la puntata,
Cartigli (tavolette scolpite) ,
Fiori di loto,
A, K, Q, J, 10 e 9 reali.

Importante! Quando ottieni una combinazione vincente che coinvolge 1 o più jolly, il tuo pagamento viene raddoppiato. Se sei super fortunato e riesci a ottenere 5 jolly su una linea di pagamento, intascherai 500 volte la puntata.

Bonus e altre funzionalità speciali
Nella slot online di IGT tutto ruota intorno alla figura di Cleopatra e al suo bonus, chiamato Cleopatra Bonus, che ti farà vincere fino a 180 giri gratis con un fantastico moltiplicatore 3x. Questa funzione viene giocata quando ottieni 3, 4 o 5 simboli Sphinx Scatter in qualsiasi posizione sui rulli, con una ricompensa che sarà 5, 20 o 100 volte la tua puntata + 15 giri gratuiti. L’unico caso in cui ciò non si può applicare questa opzione è se ottieni 5 jolly Cleopatra su una payline. Se dovessi ottenere 4 scarabei e una combinazione Wild, porterai a casa una doppia vittoria una da Cleopatra e una dal moltiplicatore 3x che ti regalerà un moltiplicatore 6x.

Perché scegliere la slot online Cleopatra
Il gioco ci ha convinti, la grafica anche se datata è curata nei minimi dettagli, con icone ben disegnate. Il sottofondo musicale è coinvolgente e ti sembra di vivere un’avventura realistica accanto alla regale Cleopatra. Puoi anche disattivare la colonna sonora e concentrarti sulla partita sia in modalità demo che con soldi reali, se sei alla ricerca di bonus di benvenuto e di promozioni speciali degni di una re!

images.alt: I simboli della slot online Cleopatra
Tabella dei pagamenti della slot Cleopatra
Per vincere a Cleopatra i simboli sulle linee vincenti devono comparire nella giusta combinazione
Oltre al gioco normale, a Cleopatra hai la possibilità di vincere delle partite bonus

name: Cleopatra

message.content:
Cleopatra:
Egyptian themes are a must-have for slot machine providers and IGT is no exception. What makes Cleopatra, the free and no registration slot game, so special besides its setting in ancient Egypt? Let's discover together in this review that will reveal new tricks to win the best winning combinations.

Cleopatra: the queen of Egypt
Cleopatra is a traditional slot developed by the iGaming giant IGT. It is one of the most popular Egyptian-themed slots of all time. It has 5 reels and 20 paylines, with an RTP that exceeds 92%. It can be played by betting from €0.10 up to a maximum of €10.00 per spin on both desktop and mobile devices. Released a few years ago, the graphics and animations may seem a bit dated, but they actually add a vintage touch to the game.

The main winning symbols
As soon as the game begins, you will find yourself in front of an ancient Egyptian temple backdrop and reels studded with precious Egyptian-style icons in addition to classic symbols:

Cleopatra is the wild symbol and replaces all icons except for the Sphinx,
The Scarab is the most rewarding and lucky symbol of this online slot game. If 5 Scarabs appear on a payline, they will win you 37.5 times your bet,
Cartouches (inscribed tablets),
Lotus flowers,
Real A, K, Q, J, 10 and 9.

Important! When you get a winning combination involving 1 or more wilds, your payment is doubled. If you're super lucky and manage to get 5 wilds on a payline, you'll win 500 times your bet.

Bonus and other special features
In IGT's online slot, everything revolves around the figure of Cleopatra and her bonus, called the Cleopatra Bonus, which will win you up to 180 free spins with a fantastic 3x multiplier. This feature is played when you get 3, 4 or 5 Sphinx scatter symbols in any position on the reels, with a reward that will be 5, 20 or 100 times your bet + 15 free spins. The only case where this option cannot be applied is if you get 5 Cleopatra wilds on a payline. If you get 4 Scarabs and a Wild combination, you'll take home a double win from Cleopatra and a 3x multiplier that will give you a 6x multiplier.

Why choose the Cleopatra online slot
The game convinced us, the graphics, even if dated, are well-crafted with well-designed icons. The background music is engaging and makes you feel like you're living a realistic adventure alongside the regal Cleopatra. You can also turn off the soundtrack and focus on the game in both demo mode and in real money mode if you're looking for welcome bonuses and special promotions worthy of a king!

rewritten_review_text:
Cleopatra as an Egyptian-themed slot

Cleopatra is a traditional slot developed by the iGaming giant IGT. It is one of the most popular Egyptian-themed slots of all time.

Gameplay and features

It has 5 reels and 20 paylines, with an RTP that exceeds 92%. It can be played by betting from €0.10 up to a maximum of €10.00 per spin on both desktop and mobile devices. The game revolves around the figure of Cleopatra and her bonus, called the Cleopatra Bonus, which will win you up to 180 free spins with a fantastic 3x multiplier. This feature is played when you get 3, 4 or 5 Sphinx scatter symbols in any position on the reels, with a reward that will be 5, 20 or 100 times your bet + 15 free spins. If you get 4 Scarabs and a Wild combination, you'll take home a double win from Cleopatra and a 3x multiplier that will give you a 6x multiplier.

Graphics and animations

Released a few years ago, the graphics and animations may seem a bit dated, but they actually add a vintage touch to the game.

Winning symbols and paylines

As soon as the game begins, you will find yourself in front of an ancient Egyptian temple backdrop and reels studded with precious Egyptian-style icons. Cleopatra is the wild symbol and replaces all icons except for the Sphinx. The Scarab is the most rewarding and lucky symbol of this online slot game. If 5 Scarabs appear on a payline, they will win you 37.5 times your bet. When you get a winning combination involving 1 or more wilds, your payment is doubled. If you're super lucky and manage to get 5 wilds on a payline, you'll win 500 times your bet.

Mobile compatibility

The game can be played on both desktop and mobile devices, with a user-friendly layout and easy-to-use controls. You can play in both demo mode and in real money mode if you're looking for welcome bonuses and special promotions worthy of a king!

expand_cleopatra-as-an-egyptian-themed-s.headline: Cleopatra as an Egyptian-Themed Slot
expand_cleopatra-as-an-egyptian-themed-s.content:
Cleopatra is a classic slot game that has been a favorite of players for years. Developed by industry leader IGT, this game is one of the top Egyptian-themed slots of all time. The game's design includes traditional symbols from ancient Egypt, such as scarabs, sphinxes, and hieroglyphics.

The game is available to play in both land-based and online casinos, with many online operators offering special bonuses and promotions specifically for Cleopatra fans. The game's popularity continues to grow, and it is commonly featured in casino tournaments and slot leagues around the world. With a high RTP and the potential for big wins, Cleopatra is a must-play for fans of Egyptian-themed slots.

expand_gameplay-and-features.headline: Gameplay and Features
expand_gameplay-and-features.content:
With its fascinating theme, Cleopatra is a popular video slot game that features 5 reels and 20 paylines. One of the most attractive aspects of this game is its impressive RTP, which exceeds 92% and ensures a great chance of winning big. The game allows you to place a minimum bet of €0.10 and a maximum bet of €10.00 per spin on both desktop and mobile devices, which is perfect for players of all levels.

The game revolves around the legendary queen of Egypt herself, and her bonus feature known as the Cleopatra Bonus. With this feature, you can earn up to 180 free spins, coupled with a fantastic 3x multiplier to increase your winnings. To trigger the Cleopatra Bonus, you need to land 3, 4, or 5 Sphinx scatter symbols in any position on the reels, which will not only reward you with free spins but also 5, 20, or 100 times your bet. Additionally, you will also receive 15 free spins, increasing your chances of winning.

If you manage to land a combination of 4 Scarabs and a Wild symbol, you will take home a double win from Cleopatra, coupled with a 3x multiplier that will give you a 6x multiplier. This is an impressive feature that sets Cleopatra apart from other slot games in the market.

expand_graphics-and-animations.headline: Graphics and Animations
expand_graphics-and-animations.content:
Cleopatra is a visually stunning slot game with impressive graphics and animations that are sure to captivate any player. Although released a few years ago, the graphics and animations still hold up today and provide an enjoyable gaming experience. While some may consider the graphics to be a little dated, they actually add a vintage touch that is perfect for the theme and atmosphere of the game.

The symbols in Cleopatra are beautifully designed and include authentic imagery from ancient Egypt. The reel animations are smooth and fluid, which adds to the overall excitement of each spin. The game background features a beautiful Egyptian landscape with pyramids, temples, and Sphinxes. The sound effects also complement the graphics and animations, creating an immersive gaming experience.

Overall, the graphics and animations in Cleopatra are of high quality and add to the overall enjoyment of the game. Despite being released a few years ago, the game still manages to impress players with its visuals and engaging gameplay. If you're looking for a visually stunning slot game, Cleopatra is definitely worth checking out.

expand_winning-symbols-and-paylines.headline: Winning Symbols and Paylines
expand_winning-symbols-and-paylines.content:
Cleopatra is a slot game that combines the thrill of spinning the reels with the historic allure of ancient Egypt. The moment you start playing this game, you’ll be transported to a different place and time, surrounded by an impressive Egyptian temple backdrop and reels that are covered with precious Egyptian-style symbols. The titular character, Cleopatra, acts as the wild symbol and can replace any other icon on the reels, except for the Sphinx. This is great news for any player since having Cleopatra in any combination can help increase your chances of winning significantly.

The Scarab is one of the most rewarding symbols in the game. If you hit five Scarabs on a payline, then you will earn 37.5 times your original bet. But that’s not all – when you get a winning combination that includes one or more wild symbols, your payout is doubled. And if you strike lucky and win with five wilds on a payline, you’ll take home an eye-watering 500 times your original bet. This combination of fun gameplay, impressive features, and the thrilling potential to win big make this game a favorite among players of all experience levels.

expand_mobile-compatibility.headline: Mobile Compatibility
expand_mobile-compatibility.content:
If you're an online casino enthusiast who likes playing games on the go, Cleopatra's mobile compatibility is definitely a plus. The game is designed to adapt to screens of all sizes, so whether you're playing on your laptop, tablet, or smartphone, you'll get an immersive and seamless gaming experience. There are no downloads or installations required, and the game can be accessed instantly via your web browser. The user-friendly layout and easy-to-use controls make playing on mobile a breeze.

In addition, the game offers both demo mode and real money mode, so you can choose the option that suits you best. Playing in demo mode allows you to get a feel for the game and its features without risking any of your own money. On the other hand, playing in real money mode can lead to welcome bonuses and special promotions worthy of a king! In either case, the game's mobile compatibility ensures that you'll be able to take advantage of all the benefits of playing online casino games whenever and wherever you want.

Whether you prefer to play on your desktop or your mobile device, Cleopatra's mobile compatibility makes it a versatile and accessible game. Its adaptability to different screen sizes and easy-to-use controls, combined with its demo mode and real money mode options, make it a top choice for online casino players. Give Cleopatra a spin on your mobile device and discover why it's one of the most popular online slot games of all time!
